name: Chekrut Kerberos
text:
1 FIRE monster except "Chekrut Kerberos"
If this card is Link Summoned: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 "Chekrut" monster from your GY. If this card is in your GY, and you control a "Chekrut" monster (Quick Effect): You can banish this card; add 1 FIRE monster from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot Summon cards with that name for the rest of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Chekrut Kerberos" once per turn.
